title: Gone from carrying to not getting a single kill.
body:
I'm around level 22 now, for the last 2 or so levels I have been getting utterly destroyed, not as a team, my team is just as good as the enemies but I only ever get 0 - 5 kills and around 10 deaths a game (Varies). Did something happen to the skill level of the games I'm in or should I just not play (I'm causing my team to lose in most games) ps. The game is becoming unfun since every role I play I just get outplayed. 

I play, {{champion:67}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:23}} {{champion:43}} {{champion:412}}  occasionly others.

replies.body:
Play for the objectives.  Sure kills are great but if you can't work as a team and take objectives gg.

Watch the map like a hawk. Play safe if you don't know where the enemy jungler is. If your opponent is passive thwn starts going ham... get out jungler is there.  If you go to ward dat bush and they start going all in get out the jungler is in that bush
If you see enemy jungler on map.. ping it. If you see jungler no where near you go a little ham on your opponent

Ward.. ping wards. 

Watch your enemy.. if they poke with spells. . Let em run out of mana then go in

Time enemy spells.  Bait out that spell.  Bait their escape.  Scare their flash oitta them

Ping the enemy you gonna focus let the team know ult is up or ult in 15 let em know you dont have ult

If you low on health or mana. Don't go in

Dont chase that enemy into unwarded jungle.  If you've killed 3 or 4 of em.. go for a tower don't chase that low hp guy. . He cant stop ya
 
Be aware of baron and drag timers

Watch lanes if adc and supp are bot right away. . Jungler started top and will likely gank bot or mid around 3 mins or so
Thank you. You've listed a lot of things which I didn't really think of before. I'm sure if I don't play so aggressive with no vision of the jungle I'll save my self some frustrating deaths.

> [{quoted}](name=FreezingPandora,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=1uvd4TuA,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-04-06T07:17:45.783+0000)
>
> Thank you. You've listed a lot of things which I didn't really think of before. I'm sure if I don't play so aggressive with no vision of the jungle I'll save my self some frustrating deaths.

No problem.  All this advice is how I've been able to climb all the way to bronze V

> No problem.  All this advice is how I've been able to climb all the way to bronze V

Hehehe, yeah and that's quite an accomplishment these days, with all of that reduction of time needed to get to level 30. Good job!

Also if you are a top laner, consider getting a blue trinket at level 9. It's free and you can ward without facechecking bushes that might have enemies in it. You can also spot people collapsing towards you. This all while smashing the towers in your lane.
Maybe coz the last two updates changed some of the champ abilities
